text: Nigel Palfreyman (born 2 October 1973) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with the Brisbane Bears and Fitzroy in the Australian Football League (AFL). Palfreyman, a Tasmanian, was picked up by Brisbane in the 1990 AFL Draft. He played 15 of a possible 24 games in 1992 but didn't make a senior appearance in 1993.AFL Tables: Nigel Palfreyman He was traded, along with David Bain, to Fitzroy in the 1993 AFL Draft. His only league game for Fitzroy came against Richmond at Western Oval. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Tasmania Category:Brisbane Bears players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Sandy Bay Football Club players Category:Living people
title: Nigel Palfreyman
